00023 /* MD2 header */
00024 class md2_header_t
00025 {
00026         public:
00027                 int ident;
00028                 int version;
00029 
00030                 int skinwidth;
00031                 int skinheight;
00032 
00033                 int framesize;
00034

00047                 int offset_end;
00048 };
00049 
00050 /* Texture name */
00051 class md2_skin_t
00052 {
00053         public:
00054                 char name[64];
00055 };
00056 
00057 /* Texture coords */
00058 class md2_texCoord_t
00059 {
00060         public:
00061                 short s;
00062                 short t;
00063 };
00064 
00065 /* Triangle info */
00066 class md2_triangle_t
00067 {
00068         public:
00069                 unsigned short vertex[3];
00070                 unsigned short st[3];
00071 };
00072 
00073 /* Compressed vertex */
00074 class md2_vertex_t
00075 {
00076         public:
00077                 unsigned char v[3];
00078                 unsigned char normalIndex;
00079 };
00080 
00081 /* Model frame */
00082 class md2_frame_t
00083 {
00084         public:
00085           vec3_t scale;
00086           vec3_t translate;
00087           char name[16];
00088           std::vector<md2_vertex_t> verts;
00089 };
00090 
00091 /* GL command packet */
00092 class md2_glcmd_t
00093 {
00094         public:
00095           float s;
00096           float t;
00097           int index;
00098 };
00099

00101 class md2_model_t
00102 {
00103         public:
00104                 md2_header_t header;

00106                 std::vector<md2_texCoord_t> texcoords;

00108                 std::vector<md2_frame_t> frames;
00109                 std::vector<int> glcmds;

00111 };
